title: Biogen’s Alzheimer’s Revelation Isn’t So Simple
text:
A stunning reversal of fortune for an experimental Alzheimer’s disease drug has Biogen shares off the mat. But investors shouldn’t abandon their skepticism just yet.

Tuesday morning was a memorable one for Biogen shareholders. The company said it now plans to pursue regulatory approval for aducanumab, an investigational treatment for early Alzheimer’s disease. This was a shock to investors, as the company had seemingly thrown in the towel on the drug after a pair phase 3 studies of the drug back in March.
